title: Canada losses 25,000 jobs in January
desc: Statistics Canada said Friday the economy lost 25,000 jobs in January, holding the unemployment rate drops to 6.5 per cent.

title: Majority of O-Train vehicles remain out of service for ongoing issue
desc: The majority of Ottawa’s light rail transit vehicles remain out of service, more than two-weeks after a new issue was found. A new update by OC Transpo on Feb. 6 details that 20 vehicles are fixed, two more than last week. However, 61 trains are out of service, with a possible 20 that could be […]

title: Boss of lobbying firm founded with Peter Mandelson quits after Epstein revelations
desc: Ben Wegg-Prosser resigns from Global Counsel as emails show Epstein’s help was sought in setting up the company

title: Minnesota enforcement changes follow tensions between ICE and Border Patrol
desc: The Trump administration's immigration operation in Minnesota is now being unified under U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement.

title: Two suspects arrested at JKIA over nationwide Mpesa thefts
desc: Detectives from the Directorate of Criminal Investigations (DCI) Banking Fraud Unit have arrested two suspects linked to a nationwide wave of Mpesa theft.

title: Amazon, Google, Meta, Microsoft Boost AI Spending, Stocks React
desc: Big Tech's capital expenditures soar with Amazon, Google, Meta, and Microsoft at the forefront, ushering a new era of AI infrastructure spending.

title: Optimizing DNA Delivery with Nuclear Localization Signals
desc: A new method greatly increases the efficacy of gene delivery into the nucleus, reducing required doses and minimizing harmful side effects.

title: Stock Market Today: Major Indexes Sharply Rebound After Sell-Off; Dow Hits All-Time High, Nears 50000; Bitcoin Bounces Back Above $70,000
desc: Major stock indexes bounced back sharply Friday, with the Dow Jones Industrial Average soaring 1,000 points to a record high, a day after equities sank amid risk-off sentiment. Still, the Nasdaq and S&P 500 were poised to register weekly losses.

title: Man City XI vs Liverpool FC: Confirmed team news, predicted lineup and injury latest for Premier League
desc: Pep Guardiola could be without his captain at Anfield

title: Fire erupts at factory in Karachi's Landhi Export Processing Zone
desc: Sindh CM's aide says fire and rescue teams, along with ambulances and fire brigade trucks, rushed to the site
